game_description: Connec2 is an XR collaboration platform for lifelike designs, review sessions and work instructions. High quality voice, precise movements and a low latency communication provide an endless productive experience. Recognizability in a virtual environment is important. Both on a personal level and productively. Create your own brand identity within your virtual workspace without effort. Connec2's 3D Workflow has powerful capabilities to transfer knowledge from one person to another, or even a group. Quickly iterate through designs and share them together with stakeholders. Connec2 offers an accessible solution. Instead of developing expensive XR software from scratch, Connec2 allows teams to effortlessly meet, publish and share content to start implementing XR today!
